Button.source:
Event

```html
<Button on-click="{ v = Math.random() }">Random</Button>
<Input value="{ v }"></Input>
```

Checkbox.source:
Event ```html Option 1 Option 2 Option 3

Checked：{ ( v && v.length > 0 ) ? v : 'none' } ```

code.html:
Option 1 Option 2 Option 3

Checked：{ ( v && v.length > 0 ) ? v : 'none' }

Countdown.source:
Format

```html
<Countdown
	end="{ Date.now() + 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 }"
	format="[D] or [DAY] 天 [H] or [HOUR] 时 [M] or [MINUTE] 分 [S] or [SECOND] 秒"
></Countdown>
```

code.html:
<Countdown
    end="{ Date.now() + 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7 }"
    format="[D] or [DAY] 天 [H] or [HOUR] 时 [M] or [MINUTE] 分 [S] or [SECOND] 秒"
></Countdown>

Countdown.source:
Event ```html {#if !isTimeEnd} {#else} {/if}

isTimeEnd: { isTimeEnd ? 'true' : 'false' }

```

Form.source: ### Pure provides you two common form layout
Form.html: Pure provides you two common form layout

Form.source:
Horizontal

```html
<Form>
	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>
	
	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Button primary>Register</Button>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>
</Form>
```

code.html:
<Form>
    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Button primary>Register</Button>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>
</Form>

Form.source:
Vertical

```html
<Form v>
	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
		<FormControl>

	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>

	<FormItem>
		<FormLabel></FormLabel>
		<FormControl>
			<Button primary>Register</Button>
		</FormControl>
	</FormItem>
</Form>
```

code.html:
<Form v>
    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Nickname</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Nickname"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel>Email</FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder="Your Email"></Input>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Checkbox>Agree something</Checkbox>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>

    <FormItem>
        <FormLabel></FormLabel>
        <FormControl>
            <Button primary>Register</Button>
        </FormControl>
    </FormItem>
</Form>

Input.source:
Error Status With Error Message

```html
<Input error="{ true }" error-message="{ 'This field is REQUIRED' }"></Input>
```

code.html: <Input error="{ true }" error-message="{ 'This field is REQUIRED' }"></Input>

Modal.source:
Basic Usage ```html {#if show}
{/if} ```

code.html:
{#if show}
{/if}

Note.source:
Basic Usage

```html
<Note type="info">info</Note>
<Note type="success">success</Note>
<Note type="warning">warning</Note>
<Note type="error">error</Note>
```

Pagination.source:
Basic Usage

```html
<Pagination
	min="{ 50 }"
	max="{ 100 }"
	current="{ current || 50 }"
	prev-text="<"
	next-text=">"
	on-change="{ current = $event }"
></Pagination>
Current: { current || 50 }
```

code.html:
<Pagination
    min="{ 50 }"
    max="{ 100 }"
    current="{ current || 50 }"
    prev-text="<"
    next-text=">"
    on-change="{ current = $event }"
></Pagination>
Current: { current || 50 }

Checked：{ v || 'none' } ```

code.html:
Option 1 Option 2 Option 3

Switch.source:
Event ```html

Checked: { v !== undefined ? v : 'none' } ```

code.html: Checked: { v !== undefined ? v : 'none' }

{ ds.name } { ds.email }
